Title: Blood of Old
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: AndrewWatt96
Publisher: AndrewWatt96
Release Date: Jun 23, 2015

Visit the website View update history Read related news View discussions Find Community Groups
Share Embed  

Early Access Game

Get instant access and start playing; get involved with this game as it develops.

Note: This Early Access game is not complete and may or may not change further. If you are not excited to play this game in its current state, then you should wait to see if the game progresses further in development. Learn more

What the developers have to say:

Why Early Access?

“We want to work closely with the community, the community can play our game while proving suggestions for what they want to see in the future for this product. We wish to make a game tailored to the communities wants, so will work closely with the community with implementing the features they want to see in the game.

Early Access also allows us to use funding generated from sales to improve the game, funding is key and with low funding the quality of the final product will not be as good as we wish. However regardless of funding we will still provide the final product as promised!”

Approximately how long will this game be in Early Access?

“1-2 years. We aim for 1 year to final release but 2 years may occur if we need to take more time to polish the product, so we do not rush a horrible product to final release.”

How is the full version planned to differ from the Early Access version?

“Graphics and game-play will be upgraded drastically throughout early access so we can provide a good quality end product for the community. Quality is key along with providing a game for the community that they really want, with features they suggested and wanted.

What we already have planned for future development:
  • RPG storyline
  • Hunger/Thirst player survival elements
  • Siege warfare
  • Base Building from scratch
  • Improved graphical and gameplay elements.
  • multiplayer (co/op and PVP)
”

What is the current state of the Early Access version?

“Very good, playable with minimal bugs. Although most of what you see in-game is placeholders and most likely be changed by our finished version, this meaning, models, textures, etc.

We plan to release updates at least once a week, in worst case scenarios at least once a month, but we hope to be releasing weekly as we wish to keep the community invested in our game and wish them to trust we can deliver on our promises.”

Will the game be priced differently during and after Early Access?

“The price may change in later stages of early access and moving towards final release. We do not plan to drastically change the price, but it may increase as we move forward.”

How are you planning on involving the Community in your development process?

“The community will play a key role in our early access, we wish to build a game around what the community wants, they tell us what they want, we do our best to provide it in the game. Although we can not guarantee 100% of what the community wants due to budgeting or limited resources we will not deny any suggestions we have the ability to provide and feel will make a good addition to the game.

We will be very active with the community through the use of Steam forums and other social media methods.”
Read more

GUI Optimizations Should work better on almost all resolutions!

Basic stamina and healing:
Fighting will drain your stamina
To regen stamina eat.
Stamina will regen over time if your have eaten enough food but will drain your hunger fast.
Healing will regen your health over time if you have enough food but will drain your hunger fast!

Animals:
Stag
Rabbit
Boar

Combat system:
Enemy now has a 10% chance of delivering a cirital hit blow
You can now use a power move that will damage the enemy greatly but will drain your stamina super fast! (middle mouse button)
Regular attacks now use a little bit of stamina

About This Game

Blood of Old, Indie , RPG, First person, Strategy, with an in depth story line.

  • Begin as a simple mercenary and make a name for yourself, become commander of armies and conqueror of cities, or become a despised outlaw with murder and thievery.
  • Manage your castles and cities from First Person ensuring they keep a smooth economy and happy peoples.
  • Manage your armies and battle on the ground with them in epic intense battles!
  • Play through the story line and find the Blood of Old and help them regain their throne and restore peace to a war torn country.

Key features


  • Army building
  • Troop management
  • Buy and ride horses and explore the vast open world!
  • Renown system, become and outlaw or hero, your choice!
  • Hunger player survival elements
  • Earn gold by completing quests or by outlaw ways, and use gold to buy castles and items

Planned for future Development


  • RPG storyline
  • Castle Management
  • Siege warfare
  • Base Building from scratch
  • Improved graphical and gameplay elements.
  • multiplayer (co/op and PVP)
(with your help we can make a game tailored to the communites wants)

What makes us different?


  • Active development with the community, what you want in the game you will get!
  • A mix between strategy and rpg games elements from both inculded!
  • Planned survival elements against nature, including hunger and thirst!
READ MORE

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows XP+
    • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
    • Hard Drive: 2 GB available space

Worst_Shot

Not Recommended

Posted: October 14
Early Access Review
Start a new game
Running at 20-25 fps
Tutorial starts
Press next
Text from before is now being overlayed by new text
Game crashes

_____________________

This game is terrible, I feel almost ashamed that I even own this. Its being way too kind to call this shovelware, since that would seem to imply that some kind of tool or implement was used to dump this pile of crap onto Steam.

The game can't barely even hit 30 fps on the lowest setings and mostly runs at 20-25 fps, very poorly optimized. The dev got this game through greenlight through bribing people with free keys.

The graphics don't seem to reflect the difficulty of trying to get this game just to hit 30 fps, games either need to have good graphics or a good aesthetics. Blood of Old has neither.

The menus look dull and scream of default unity GUI. The animations are terrible and look almost nothing like what they're trying to be. Items are difficult to pick up at times and the combat is one dimmensional at best.

I can see the 'developers' vision when making this game, but this guy has clearly taken on a project too big for himself. I'd recommend Mount and Blade Warband over this game, if you want to be a warrior starting from the bottom and becoming a vassal or king with your own castle. Then thats probably a better game for you, it also has mod support, multiplayer and trading cards. If you get it on sale you may get a better deal than buying Blood of Old at full price.

The 'dev' has now added trading cards try and get some positive reviews, this reflects a larger issue on Steam. That people will actually rate a bad game positively due to trading cards, its unfortunate.

People seem to try and defend this game, saying its not a AAA game or that its in early access or that its made by an indie developer.

These excuses are just not valid. Have some standards and release something worth showing. I'd feel cheated if I spent a single penny on this, luckily I did not.
Read More
